# [Interview #487: Brandon Sanderson's Blog: Upcoming Signings + Typical Rambling, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=487#2)

#### Brandon Sanderson

Oh, and a quick note.
*Towers of Midnight*
is going very well. I had a good week of writing on it, and I'm more and more certain it will be in on time. If that's the case, we'll see it October next year.
